archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: DPO Platform
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
DPO Platform Goal: Making easier DPO leads processing from the perspective of CC, DPO teams and vendors
Key Features: - Create a DPO campaign - Allocate providers (vendors) - Receive leads from vendors - Upload DPO leads to Main DB - Collect the leads' statuses from Lead Tool - DPO Campaigns progress tracking
Пепин
